project_abstract.cdata: The Third Indian Iron and Steel Company Project in India will assist in financing the expansion and opening up of coal mines and the construction of coal transportation facilities. This project will consist of steel-making facilities at Burnpur, the installation of a 6-mile long feeder ropeway from Jitpur to Chasnalla, and a 32-mile long ropeway from Chasnalla to Burnpur. This project will provide the company with a steady supply of coking coal of satisfactory quality.
